tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE VotingRecords (
  official_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  official_name VARCHAR(50),
  vote_date DATE,
  decision VARCHAR(255),
  party_affiliation VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE public_officials (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    party_affiliation VARCHAR(50),
    position VARCHAR(50),
    district VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE voting_records (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    official_id INT,
    vote_decision VARCHAR(50),
    vote_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (official_id) REFERENCES public_officials(id)
);

CREATE TABLE officials (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  party VARCHAR(50),
  district VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE votes (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  official_id INT,
  vote_date TIMESTAMP,
  decision VARCHAR(50),
  FOREIGN KEY (official_id) REFERENCES officials(id)
)

CREATE TABLE sessions (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  session_date DATE,
  agenda TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE voting_records (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  official_id INT,
  vote_id INT,
  vote_decision VARCHAR(50),
  vote_result VARCHAR(20),
  FOREIGN KEY (official_id) REFERENCES officials(id),
  FOREIGN KEY (vote_id) REFERENCES votes(id)
)

CREATE TABLE voting_records (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  official_id INT NOT NULL,
  vote DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL,
  vote_date DATE NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (official_id) REFERENCES public_officials(id)
);

CREATE TABLE bills (
  bill_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  bill_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  proposed_by INT NOT NULL,
  proposed_date DATE NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (proposed_by) REFERENCES public_officials(id)
);

CREATE TABLE committee_assignments (
  assignment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  official_id INT NOT NULL,
  committee_id INT NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE NOT NULL,
  end_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (official_id) REFERENCES public_officials(id),
  FOREIGN KEY (committee_id) REFERENCES committees(committee_id)
);
